label: specifiedInstalmentPlan
comment: The payment instalment plan specified for this header trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: A plan for paying a total sum of money by several payments made over a period of time.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
